dialogues.speaker: Captain
dialogues.text: We're setting sail towards the unknown; prepare yourself!

dialogues.speaker: Sailor
dialogues.text: Aye, Captain! Ready at your command!

dialogues.speaker: Captain
dialogues.text: Lookout! What do you see up ahead?

dialogues.speaker: Lookout
dialogues.text: Land ho, Captain! An island off the starboard bow!

dialogues.speaker: Captain
dialogues.text: Alright, prepare to drop anchor. We shall explore this new land.
